document_data.name: Soya sauce
document_data.mainbody: '''Soya sauce''' was a type of sauce from [[Shou Lung]].
document_data.Description: The sauce had a unique and distinctive,
document_data.Availability: Outside of [[Kara-Tur]], soya sauce was available for purchase through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']], which marketed it as "Auroraâ€™s Authentic Soya Sauce".
document_data.Usage: * Soya sauce was typically used to season soups and stews. It was also very popular among the nobility.
